name: Dragonium Adventure
description:
Dragonium Adventure is an RPG with a turn-based combat system in which you will play the main character, Nake, who will have to fight in the vast plains, in the raging oceans, on the highest desert mountains and in the darkest forests of all Akinori.

This title offers a story mode lasting about 25-30 hours of play and a very rich online multiplayer mode where you can practice the combat system by facing other players in a quick, competitive or cooperative game, using the same characters used and trained. during story mode. The quick game itself is a fast mode, where two players face off against each other to bring down the opponent's life. The competitive game also includes tournaments that will be available in the future: this mode is instead a more demanding mode than the others, defeating other players you will get points, while if you are defeated, you will lose them. Be careful, because it won't be as easy as you think! First of all you will have to study a winning tactic, or you will blow up the whole fight! We strongly recommend that you complete the story mode 100% before going into this mode, so you can improve the statistics of the team characters. The cooperative game instead is divided into two different modes: two-on-two combat, or cooperative story mode. The latter will help you complete story mode in company from start to finish. It will be possible to play from 2-4 players online for the cooperative story mode, or 2 players offline on the same platform. Online mode doesn't stop there! Exactly because once the story mode is over, it will be possible to enter the sumptuous Cave of Krakos! This cyclops has called all his giant friends to report to chase you away from his huge den! Fight against cyclops and goblin giants in this adrenaline-fueled raid mode! Up to 25 people online can join the battle and can even join while the game is going on to help you out! Once you defeat the monster, you could get incredible equipment and loot to immediately jump into online modes against other players!
